service.name: Open Science Helpdesk
service.description: This service provides a wide range of activities brought together to support stakeholders' questions on Open Science and builds a knowledge base on a range of topics targeted at different stakeholders. It includes a 24x7 Helpdesk supported by NOADs, FAQs, Factsheets, Briefing Papers and topical webinars. The whole European network of NOADs work behind the scenes at national levels to run the service.
service.targetUsers: Project Coordinators, Funders, Research Administrators, Researchers, Repository managers for literature,Repository managers for data, Open Access Publishers, National Aggregators, policy makers, learned societies, research infrastructures
service.userValue: Open Science enabler. Direct and round the clock support for wide ranging issues on Open Science across European Research Institutions, Projects and Individuals
service.userBase: Daily tickets and NOADs contact by all stakeholder types
service.providers: OpenAIRE consortium, National Open Access Desks (NOADs)
